scripts.setup: yarn install && cd SovendusApp/sovendus-plugins-commons && yarn install
scripts.build:prod: yarn build && yarn copy-build && yarn zip-builds && rm -rf dist
scripts.copy-build: mkdir -p dist && rsync -av SovendusApp/ dist/SovendusApp/  --exclude sovendus-plugins-commons/builder --exclude sovendus-plugins-commons/.vscode --exclude 'sovendus-plugins-commons/node_modules' --exclude sovendus-plugins-commons/.gitignore --exclude sovendus-plugins-commons/.eslintrc.json --exclude sovendus-plugins-commons/.git
scripts.zip-builds: zip-build dist releases -o -t %NAME%_%VERSION%.%EXT% && zip-build dist releases -o -t %NAME%_latest.%EXT%
